client_id.description: client-id, use "test_client_id" in the dev env.

client_secret.description: client-secret, use "test_client_secret" in the dev env.

client_id.description: client-id, use "test_client_id" in the dev env.

client_secret.description: client-secret, use "test_client_secret" in the dev env.

read.description: 已知這個板的最新文章.

ParamsMax.name: max
ParamsMax.description: max number of the returned list, requiring <= 300

ParamsStartIdx.name: startIdx
ParamsStartIdx.description: starting idx, '' if fetch from the beginning.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: the newest-time in the list. -1 will starting from newest post if not specified. required if is a continuing-fetch (not fetching from the beginning).

parameters.name: startBID
parameters.description: starting board-id, '' if not specified. required if is a continuing-fetch (not fetching from the beginning).

parameters.name: startAID
parameters.description: starting article-id, '' if not specified. required if is a continuing-fetch (not fetching from the beginning).

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: max number of the returned posts, require <= 1000

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: query string, '' returns all boards

main.description: main-content of the article (not including comments)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: fields to retrieve, separated by ',' ex: aid,postTime,updateTime

parameters.name: ascending
parameters.description: sort timestamp starting from oldest (ascending: true) or from newest (ascending: false)

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: the start-time in the list. -1 will starting from oldest (ascending: true) or from newest (ascending: false) post if not specified. required if is a continuing-fetch (not fetching from the beginning).

parameters.name: startAID
parameters.description: starting article-id, '' if not specified. required if is a continuing-fetch (not fetching from the beginning).

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: max number of the returned posts, require <= 1000

vote.description: number of votings in this board.

lastSetTime.description: last time of setting the baord (in unix-time).

endGamble.description: time to end the gamble (in unix-time).

read.description: reached the end of the post-list (or not).

parameters.name: board
parameters.description: board-id

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: fields to retrieve, separated by ','' ex: bid,title,boardType,cat

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: the newest-time in the list. -1 will starting from newest post if not specified. required if is a continuing-fetch (not fetching from the beginning).

parameters.name: startBID
parameters.description: starting board-id, '' if not specified. required if is a continuing-fetch (not fetching from the beginning).

parameters.name: startAID
parameters.description: starting article-id, '' if not specified. required if is a continuing-fetch (not fetching from the beginning).

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: max number of the returned posts, require <= 1000

parameters.name: newestTime
parameters.description: the newest-time in the list. -1 will starting from newest comment. required if is a continuing-fetch (not fetching from the beginning).

parameters.name: startAID
parameters.description: starting postID, '' if not specified. required if is a continuing-fetch (not fetching from the beginning).

parameters.name: startCID
parameters.description: starting commentID, '' if not specified. required if is a continuing-fetch (not fetching from the beginning).

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: max number of the returned posts, require <= 1000

lastAct.description: last-time user did any activity (in unix-time).

lastSong.description: last-time the user ordered an song (in unix-time).

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: fields to retrieve, separated by ',' ex: uid,nickname,realname
